name: Song Angel
description: A large celestial creature embodying lawful good, the Song Angel possesses a high Charisma and radiant features, carrying a scimitar and a horn.
memorable: The Song Angel can inspire allies with divine music, re-rolling failed checks with advantage.
goals: To protect and support allies, while combating evil.
relations: Often found with other celestial beings, or as guardians of good.
environment: Typically inhabits sacred areas or places of righteousness.
strengths: Resists radiant damage and can heal and protect allies with its spells.
weaknesses: Reliance on spells and saving throws can be a strategic limitation.
attacks: Uses a scimitar for slashing damage, enhanced with radiant energy, and employs a horn to create a thunderous blast.
most_powerful_ability: Angelic Weapons ability adds substantial radiant damage to its attacks.
equipment: Scimitar and a special horn for invoking spirits.
skills: Highly skilled in Performance and Insight, fostering social interactions.
additional_information: Can polymorph into humanoid forms for stealth or social situations.
Immune to being charmed, exhausted, or frightened.
Summons warrior spirits to aid in battle.
Can cast powerful spells like Mass Cure Wounds.
Has exceptional Charisma, enhancing its spellcasting abilities.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting using Charisma, with a variety of supportive and control spells.
test_queries: angel that can summon warrior spirits
